name: 灵幻先生
description:
The Exorcist is a puzzle & adventure game with devious puzzle design and dark style. You play a ancient Chinese exorcist to fight against ghosts with mysterious Chinese spell and black magic.

Players need to use the tips of each level as well as up to three kinds of magic devices, crack down on the organs, kill wild ghosts, unlock the puzzles, lead out ghost kings to kill them.
